bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make honey.
🌼 I help flowers grow.
💛 Black and yellow is my design

bug.question: I have spots and like to land on plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People think I bring good luck.
⚫ I'm usually red or orange with black dots.
🍃 Gardeners like me!

bug.question: I march in lines and carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
I'm a picnic spoiler.

bug.question: I jump really high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I'm usually green.
🎵 I make music in the summer.
🌾 I love to live in fields.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home can be sticky.
🕷️ I have eight legs, not six.
🦗 I eat insects.

bug.question: I change from a caterpillar to something beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a larva.
🌈 I have colorful wings.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 My light helps me find a mate.
✨ I am an insect.
🌃 You can often see me on a summer night.

bug.question: I make a loud buzzing sound and suck blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 Some people find me annoying.
🩸 Only females bite.
🌊 I love warm, humid weather.

bug.question: I am known for eating wood and living in large colonies. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 We build large nests in the ground or in wood.
🪵 Our name sounds like 'ter-might'.
🐜 We are sometimes mistaken for ants.

bug.question: I look like a stick and blend in with the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 My camouflage is amazing.
🌿 I'm a master of disguise.
🍃 I'm an insect that looks like a twig.

cosmos.question: I'm the star that shines the brightest, keeping our planet warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 Plants need me to grow.
🌞 I rise in the East and set in the West.
😎 You need sunscreen when I'm out.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of rock that orbits the sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌎 I'm the third planet from the sun.
☁️ I have air to breathe.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's natural satellite, shining bright at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🌊 I cause tides in the ocean.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot, giant ball of gas, much bigger than Earth, and the center of our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: ⚛️ I am made of hydrogen and helium.
🌡️ I create light and heat.
🪐 All planets orbit me.

cosmos.question: I am known as the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People are planning to visit me someday.
🏜️ I have a very dusty and rocky surface.
🤖 Rovers explore my surface.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a giant red spot.
💨 I'm a gas giant.
🪐 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am also a gas giant.
🪐 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that form a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa A famous one is called the Big Dipper.
✨ People used to use me for navigation.
🔭 You need a dark sky to see me well.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big!
💫 There are many different shapes of me.
🥛 Our one is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a giant cloud of gas and dust in space, often where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can be many different colors.
📸 Telescopes take beautiful pictures of me.
✨ Stars are born inside of me.
